column5: My place is close to Canton First Monday Trade Days Market, Golf Course, Purtis Creek State Park, Splash Kingdom Family Water Park, and four beautiful East Texas lakes. Youâ€™ll love my place because of the quiet, relaxing country setting, laid back ambiance, and beautiful red birds in the distance. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and families (with kids).
